helpText: Create your team by adding the ones you wish
We'll create a Whatsapp/Telegram group with them

team.helpText: Create your team of {nMin} to {nMax} ambassadors, the click "@:team.btn.text"

disabledMsg.title: Team is not ready yet!
disabledMsg.body: You need at least {n} more ambassadors to go

body.room: You may add up to {n} more ambassadors

snackBar.admin: This guy is an admin and cannot be removed

full.title: Team is full! Remove someone first
full.body: Your team can have {n} ambassadors at most

0.title: Confirm Team?
0.text: Your team looks awesome! Either confirm it and go straight to create the chat with them or make some last minute changes if you wish.

1.title: WhatsApp or Telegram?
1.text: Now let's create the group with the ambassadors of your team either on WhatsApp or Telegram. Click on the button of your favorite app, then input your mobile number for Whatsapp or the username for Telegram.

wa.errorNumber: Insert your mobile number so we can contact you on WhatsApp

2.title: All good!
2.text1: You will be invited in a chat named "Welcome To Sicily" within the next 24 hours. We can't wait to meet you on chat :)
2.text2: If you are experiencing any issues or simply want to get in touch with us either Contact Us from the button below or ping us in the live chat.

faq.title: Reach us out
faq.text: It's Andrea and Paolo here, two friends who are trying to create an awesome service to welcome people in this amazing land. Please feel free to reach us out on Telegram or by email for whataver reason!
